settings.announcement_text: BLACK FRIDAY FLOOR SALE: Save up to 90% on LVT, SPC, wood, and laminate flooring

settings.newsletter_content: Be the first to see new arrivals, exclusive deals and much more.
settings.newsletter_privacy: By clicking 'sign up' you are opting in to marketing. You can unsubscribe at any time. Privacy Policy.

settings.announcement_title: FREE DELIVERY ON ANY LUSSO FLOORING

settings.home_split_text_title: We have been selling flooring for 25 years.
settings.home_split_text_content: We are passionate about beautiful flooring and giving all our customers the best craftsmanship and materials, delivered quickly and on time, at a price you can afford. Which has made us one of the UK’s favourite online flooring stores.

settings.usp_delivery_text_large: On all flooring orders over £750.00 Inc VAT.
settings.usp_returns_text_large: Simply return unused and unopened flooring product for a full refund.
settings.usp_sample_text_large: Choosing is easy with free samples direct to your door.
settings.usp_guarantee_text_large: Whether engineered wood flooring, carpet, LVT or laminate flooring, we buy directly from the manufacturer.

settings.home_split_quote_slider_text: I rang as I wanted some reassurance before purchasing our engineered wood floor. The chap I spoke to was brilliant, went above and beyond to help me. Really pleased.
The delivery was straightforward and we were extremely impressed with the quality of the flooring we had chosen. Would recommend!

Second time we shopped with Stories Flooring. Both times we bought Amtico and are extremely happy with the service provided. Our flooring looks fabulous and Stories are the cheapest flooring shops we have found in the UK.

Excellent price for the flooring we wanted, cheaper than anywhere else. First class service from the sales contact Craig who discussed our requirements and offered advice on quantity. Prompt delivery ahead of time and they even loaded the pallet into the garage. Flooring looks great many thanks. Would happily use Stories again.

settings.about_hero_content:
Stories Flooring was formerly know as Lifestyle Flooring UK and rebranded in November 2020 to accommodate a greater audience and create a new chapter. 
Discover everything you need to know about our rebrand and let us help create the next chapter in your story.
We believe flooring can transform a place, changing its mood and its story. We’re passionate about providing you with the best craftsmanship and materials, delivered on time, at a price you can afford. We’ve been doing it for 25 years and this obsession looks set to continue.

settings.about_text_indent_split_content:
We pride ourselves in delivering excellent customer service and great value for money and an exceptional, fast and well priced delivery system at all times.

With our very prominent sourcing team we have met many contacts around the world, which gives us the power to import products into the UK at the cheapest prices direct from the manufacturer, cutting out the wholesaler.

This means we can provide the very best price and service to the customer.

settings.error_hero_title: Oops, that page no longer exists
settings.error_hero_content: It looks like that story has ended. To get you back on track use the links below to browse our products. Or start again by visiting our homepage.

settings.key_collections_slide_image_alt: Buy LVT (Luxury Vinyl Tiles) Flooring Online
settings.key_collections_slide_description: Blending practicality and authenticity, luxury vinyl tiles allows you to bring your dream space to life with ease.
Versatile and beautiful, engineered wood floors can transform your space with a durable feel and a wide range of finishes.
Indestructible and inexpensive, laminates highly realistic wood or stone looks come in almost limitless colours and patterns to choose from.
This iconic and stylish design is available in a range of materials, and is great if you want to make a luxury statement.
SPC (Stone Plastic Composite) is a type of LVT flooring which utilises the latest technology. Ideal for homes and commercial properties.
The smell, the texture, the feel under your feet. Solid wooden floors are hardwearing, gorgeous, and a true investment that’ll last forever.
Browse the flooring we have selected that are easy to install, making them perfect for the DIY enthusiast.

settings.key_collections_content: We’ve got thousands of floors to choose from but these collections are our absolute favourites.

settings.samples_hero_title: Free samples to help make the big decision
settings.samples_hero_content: At Stories Flooring, we know how difficult it can be deciding upon which floor to invest in when you’re shopping online. That’s why we offer free samples whenever we can.

settings.samples_text_indent_split_content:
Did you know that we’re one of the few flooring company within the UK which currently offers Quickstep samples? So, whichever type of floor you’re considering, you can be sure we have samples available for you to try before you buy.

You can order up to 6 free samples. Please note that if you order multiple samples they may not come altogether as some come direct from manufacturers.

If the samples you choose are not quite to your liking then please do call our friendly sales team on 0113 320 0223 who can offer advice based on your specific requirements. If we are not open then just drop us a message on info@storesflooring.co.uk or contact us via the live chat option

settings.samples_browse_text: Simply browse our entire catalogue of products and when you find one you like
settings.samples_request_sample_text: Look out for the “Free Sample” button and add click to your basket. A delivery charge is applied for more than 3 samples.
settings.samples_post_text: Just tell us where you want the sample to be delivered and it will be with you

settings.samples_text_split_content:
Samples allow you to get the best idea of what a floor would look like in your home. This is especially beneficial when you’re buying online as it is difficult to get a good idea of what the floor looks and feels like without actually seeing and touching it.

You can also use the samples to compare different floors in order to decide which one is right for your home or business. This can help to prevent you from splashing out on the wrong floor.

Browse our flooring collection today to start building your sample order. Or, if you have any questions, call our friendly team who will be happy to assist you when putting a sample order together.

settings.about_text_split_content:
Due to our large warehouse, Stories Flooring can bulk buy to offer discounted prices to all our customers and beat any competitor.

We have the ability to store thousands of square meters of Amtico, Karndean, Quick-Step, Solid Wood and all other ranges of flooring we supply.
settings.about_text_split_image_alt: Stories Flooring Unit 2 Wortley Business Park Amberley Road Leeds LS12 4BD 01133200223 info@storiesflooring.co.uk

settings.ff_module_title: It’s time to start your story. Find your perfect flooring
settings.ff_module_content: With thousands of floors to choose from the options can be overwhelming. But don’t worry we’ve devised a gadget to help. Answer a few simple questions to find your perfect floor quickly and easily.
settings.ff_module_content_bottom: Or book a video appointment

settings.guide_split_text_content: Choosing the right type of flooring for your home is really important- it not only needs to look amazing but it needs to do its job properly and last its full lifespan.

settings.guide_text_indent_split_content:
Need Help Choosing a Floor?

Here you can discover which type of flooring is the perfect fit for your project, understand the make-up of each different type of flooring and learn all the best tips and tricks to give your flooring the TLC it deserves.

Need help choosing between laminate or luxury vinyl tiles? Don’t know the difference between engineered wood or solid wood flooring? We can help with that.

Have a question about maintaining the quality of your flooring? Issues with installation? We’ve all the answers to your most common questions here.

If you’re stuck with choosing which type of flooring to put in a specific room of your house, we’ve put together the following information to help you out with the selection process. Investing your money in the right product for your project not only saves you money but saves your time and effort too.

settings.guide_accordion_text: An amazing product that’s mostly made of PVC, LVTs are scratch resistant, waterproof, can be combined with underfloor heating and are amazing at keeping heat in and sound out. There’s not much that LVT can’t do- the only place we wouldn’t recommend installing them is on your staircase.

An amazing product that’s mostly made of PVC, LVTs are scratch resistant, waterproof, can be combined with underfloor heating and are amazing at keeping heat in and sound out. There’s not much that LVT can’t do- the only place we wouldn’t recommend installing them is on your staircase.

settings.about-the-team: Stories Flooring was formerly know as Lifestyle Flooring UK and rebranded in November 2020 to accommodate a greater audience and create a new chapter. Discover everything you need to know about our rebrand and let us help create the next chapter in your story. We believe flooring can transform a place, changing its mood and its story. We’re passionate about providing you with the best craftsmanship and materials, delivered on time, at a price you can afford. We’ve been doing it for 25 years and this obsession looks set to continue.

settings.banner_sale_html:
CHRISTMAS SALE
UP TO 78% OFF SELECTED Floors In Our Sale

settings.question: I have an issue with my product – what do I do now?
settings.answer: If you find a fault or your order isn’t as expected, stop laying your floor and contact our Customer Support team at 0113 320 0223 or email info@storiesflooring.co.uk. If you notice any damage upon delivery, accept the goods, take photos, and sign for them as damaged. Note the number of damaged planks and contact Customer Support to arrange replacements or refunds. Report any damage or faults within 14 days of delivery.

settings.question: Do you have any recommended couriers?
settings.answer: Yes, we recommend using National Pallets or Parcel2Go to return your items.

settings.question: What does ‘resalable condition’ mean?
settings.answer: To be considered 'resalable,' the product must be in excellent condition and in its original packaging. The packaging must have no marks or holes, and the original seal must be intact.

settings.question: I’ve changed my mind – how do I cancel my order?
settings.answer: If you change your mind before your order is dispatched, contact us for a full refund within 14 days. If you cancel while the order is en route, we will coordinate with the courier to stop the delivery and issue a refund minus any delivery expenses within 14 days. After delivery, you have 30 days to return your items.

settings.question: Will I be refunded the full amount I paid?
settings.answer: Your refund amount depends on when you cancel and if the goods are returned in resalable condition. Cancel before dispatch for a full refund. Cancel en route and receive a refund minus delivery expenses. For returned items, receive a refund minus the delivery fee, provided the items are in resalable condition within the 30-day period.

settings.process_1_content:
30 Days Return Window

You have 30 calendar days to decide if you want to keep your order or return any excess packs. Please report any damaged items within 14 days of the delivery date.
settings.process_2_content:
Return Your Items

To initiate the refund process, simply download and complete our returns form below. Include the form with your returned items.
settings.process_3_content:
14 Days to Process

We will process your refund within 14 days of receiving the returned items at our warehouse, provided they are in resalable condition. If items are damaged upon return, we may refuse a refund or issue only a partial refund.
settings.lower_content:
A Few Important Things...

! We cannot accept returns of any discontinued or limited edition products.

! The goods are your responsibility until they reach our warehouse. They must be in resalable condition, in original, unopened packaging with seals intact. We recommend photographing your goods before returning them as proof of their condition.

! Ensure additional packaging is used to protect the manufacturer’s boxes from dirt and damage during transit.

! All returns must include a completed returns form.

! You are responsible for arranging and covering the cost of returns.

Download Returns Form

settings.returns_hero_content: Need to return something? We've got you covered. If you’re not completely satisfied with your flooring or have unopened packs left over from your project, you can return them for a refund.
